title: Today's Guests: Omar, Chalky, Freddy...ODB?
itunes:title: Today's Guests: Omar, Chalky, Freddy...ODB?
description:
THU 9/1 - The man of many roles, Mr. Michael K. Williams, stops by The Breakfast Club to talk about the success of "The Night Of", "Black Market", why he won't be playing ODB in a biopic and how playing gay roles on TV has affected his personal feelings regarding his own sexuality.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
